page.title: 07COMMUNITIES 2
page.content:
{ {Easthampstead In May 1954 the Minister of Town and County planning agreed to the layouts .In 1957 the first 178 houses were built and 644 more houses were completed in 1958.Point Royal flats were built.They are the highest flats in the town,it was completely finished in 1964.Point Royal is famous,it was designed by Arup Associates.
"I live in a detached house in Qualit- as.We have a double garage,three large bedrooms and a single,a dining room,a kitchen and three bathrooms.We have an L-shaped back garden where we grow fruit trees, vegetables and flowers. Our house stands on one fifth of an acre of land.There are 86 houses in our road and they are 10-11 years old". Wendy Fry,E.Park Sch. 3rd yr.
